column4: question: in which file does phpmyadmin says to apache that localhost/phpmyadmin is the place to be?
question: in which file does phpmyadmin says to apache that http://localhost/phpmyadmin is the place to be?

use dpkg -L phpmyadmin to list the files in the package and see if there's anything relevant, probably something in /etc/ or perhaps it just places things directly in /var/www and uses the default virtualhost
ok, thanks, i will try to find it (it's not in /var/www btw)
